titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: RECURRENT LARYNGEAL NERVE INJURY INVOLVEMENT TYPE - Description

div.p: The recurrent laryngeal nerve injury involvement type during an Upper Gastrointestinal Cancer Care Spell.
RECURRENT LARYNGEAL NERVE INJURY INVOLVEMENT TYPE is required where the INTERNATIONAL ESOPHAGEAL DATABASE SURGICAL COMPLICATIONS National Code is 'Recurrent nerve injury'.
